languages.text: "Его слова сочатся зеленовато-желтым... Не думаю, что обещание будет сдержано. Подобные развлечения несут немалую выгоду именно потому, что миллиарды подданных Империума ни разу в жизни не встречались с ксеносами лицом к лицу. Невежество и любопытство рождают колоссальный спрос... так меня учили. И вижу я, урок тот был правдивым".

traits.locale_text: "Его слова сочатся зеленовато-желтым... Не думаю, что обещаение будет сдержано. Подобные развлечения несут немалую выгоду именно потому, что миллиарды подданных Империума ни разу в жизни не встречались с ксеносами лицом к лицу. Невежество и любопытство рождают колоссальный спрос... так меня учили. И вижу я, урок тот был правдивым".

languages.text: "His words are oozing with greenish-yellow hues... I do not think the promise will be kept. Such entertainment is lucrative precisely because billions of Imperium subjects have never encountered a xenos in their life. Ignorance and curiosity create colossal demand... that's what I was taught. And I can see that the lesson was truthful."
languages.original_text: "Его слова сочатся зеленовато-желтым... Не думаю, что обещание будет сдержано. Подобные развлечения несут немалую выгоду именно потому, что миллиарды подданных Империума ни разу в жизни не встречались с ксеносами лицом к лицу. Невежество и любопытство рождают колоссальный спрос... так меня учили. И вижу я, урок тот был правдивым".

traits.locale_text: "His words are oozing with greenish-yellow hues... I don't think the promise will be kept. Such entertainment is lucrative precisely because billions of Imperial subjects have never encountered a xenos in their life. Ignorance and curiosity create colossal demand... that's what I was taught. And I can see that the lesson was truthful."

"His words are oozing with greenish-yellow hues... I don't think the promise will be kept. Such entertainment is lucrative precisely because billions of Imperial subjects have never encountered a xenos in their life. Ignorance and curiosity create colossal demand... that's what I was taught. And I can see that the lesson was truthful."

"His words are oozing with greenish-yellow hues... I do not think the promise will be kept. Such entertainment is lucrative precisely because billions of Imperial subjects have never encountered a xenos in their life. Ignorance and curiosity create colossal demand... that's what I was taught. And I can see that the lesson was truthful."

"His words are oozing with greenish-yellow hues... I do not think the promise will be kept. Such entertainment is lucrative precisely because billions of Imperial subjects have never encountered a xenos in their life. Ignorance and curiosity create colossal demand... that's what I was taught. And I can see that the lesson was truthful."

"His words are oozing with greenish-yellow hues... I do not think the promise will be kept. Such entertainment is lucrative precisely because billions of Imperium subjects have never encountered a xenos in their life. Ignorance and curiosity create colossal demand... that's what I was taught. And I can see that the lesson was truthful."

languages.text: 「彼の言葉からは黄緑の色彩がにじみ出ています…約束を守ることはないでしょう。このような娯楽が儲かるのも、何十億もの帝国の臣民が人生で一度も異種族に遭遇したことがないからでしょう。無知と好奇心は巨大な需要を生むと…そう教えられました。教わったことが正しかったということが今日、証明されたと言うわけです」
languages.original_text: "His words are oozing with greenish-yellow hues... I do not think the promise will be kept. Such entertainment is lucrative precisely because billions of Imperium subjects have never encountered a xenos in their life. Ignorance and curiosity create colossal demand... that's what I was taught. And I can see that the lesson was truthful."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の言葉からは黄緑の色彩がにじみ出ています…約束を守ることはないでしょう。このような娯楽が儲かるのも、何十億もの帝国の臣民が人生で一度も異種族に遭遇したことがないからでしょう。無知と好奇心は巨大な需要を生むと…そう教えられました。教わったことが正しかったということが今日、証明されたと言うわけです」

languages.text: “这个人的话语中流露着黄绿的色调……我不认为他会遵守承诺。这种娱乐活动之所以有利可图，正是因为数十亿帝国臣民一生都未遇见过异形。无知与好奇创造了巨大的需求……我曾被教导过这样的道理。而现在，我看得出来，那节课的内容真实无疑。”
languages.original_text: "His words are oozing with greenish-yellow hues... I do not think the promise will be kept. Such entertainment is lucrative precisely because billions of Imperium subjects have never encountered a xenos in their life. Ignorance and curiosity create colossal demand... that's what I was taught. And I can see that the lesson was truthful."

traits.locale_text: “这个人的话语中流露着黄绿的色调……我不认为他会遵守承诺。这种娱乐活动之所以有利可图，正是因为数十亿帝国臣民一生都未遇见过异形。无知与好奇创造了巨大的需求……我曾被教导过这样的道理。而现在，我看得出来，那节课的内容真实无疑。”

languages.text: «Sus palabras denotan ciertos tintes verdosos, amarillentos incluso... Dudo que cumpla su promesa. Este tipo de divertimentos aporta beneficios precisamente porque miles de millones de súbditos del Imperium no se han topado con un xenos en su vida. La ignorancia y la curiosidad generan una demanda colosal... o al menos eso he aprendido. Y a la vista está que la lección era cierta».
languages.original_text: "His words are oozing with greenish-yellow hues... I do not think the promise will be kept. Such entertainment is lucrative precisely because billions of Imperium subjects have never encountered a xenos in their life. Ignorance and curiosity create colossal demand... that's what I was taught. And I can see that the lesson was truthful."

traits.locale_text: «Sus palabras denotan ciertos tintes verdosos, amarillentos incluso... Dudo que cumpla su promesa. Este tipo de divertimentos aporta beneficios precisamente porque miles de millones de súbditos del Imperium no se han topado con un xenos en su vida. La ignorancia y la curiosidad generan una demanda colosal... o al menos eso he aprendido. Y a la vista está que la lección era cierta».

languages.text: « Ses mots ont une aura jaune-vert... Je pense qu'il ne tiendra pas sa promesse. Ce genre de spectacle est lucratif parce que des milliards de sujets de l'Imperium n'ont jamais rencontré l'ombre du moindre xénos. Cette ignorance, associée à la curiosité malsaine, engendre une demande colossale... Du moins, c'est ce que l'on m'a appris, et je constate que ces enseignements étaient vrais. »
languages.original_text: "His words are oozing with greenish-yellow hues... I do not think the promise will be kept. Such entertainment is lucrative precisely because billions of Imperium subjects have never encountered a xenos in their life. Ignorance and curiosity create colossal demand... that's what I was taught. And I can see that the lesson was truthful."

traits.locale_text: « Ses mots ont une aura jaune-vert... Je pense qu'il ne tiendra pas sa promesse. Ce genre de spectacle est lucratif parce que des milliards de sujets de l'Imperium n'ont jamais rencontré l'ombre du moindre xénos. Cette ignorance, associée à la curiosité malsaine, engendre une demande colossale... Du moins, c'est ce que l'on m'a appris, et je constate que ces enseignements étaient vrais. »

languages.text: "Seine Worte haben grünlich-gelbe Farbtöne ... Ich glaube nicht, dass er sein Versprechen halten wird. Derartige Unterhaltung ist deswegen so lukrativ, weil Milliarden von Untertanen des Imperiums in ihrem ganzen Leben noch nie einem Xenos begegnet sind. Unwissenheit und Neugier schaffen enorme Nachfrage ... so habe ich das gelernt. Und hier sehe ich, dass diese Lektion der Wahrheit entspricht."
languages.original_text: "His words are oozing with greenish-yellow hues... I do not think the promise will be kept. Such entertainment is lucrative precisely because billions of Imperium subjects have never encountered a xenos in their life. Ignorance and curiosity create colossal demand... that's what I was taught. And I can see that the lesson was truthful."

traits.locale_text: "Seine Worte haben grünlich-gelbe Farbtöne ... Ich glaube nicht, dass er sein Versprechen halten wird. Derartige Unterhaltung ist deswegen so lukrativ, weil Milliarden von Untertanen des Imperiums in ihrem ganzen Leben noch nie einem Xenos begegnet sind. Unwissenheit und Neugier schaffen enorme Nachfrage ... so habe ich das gelernt. Und hier sehe ich, dass diese Lektion der Wahrheit entspricht."

languages.text: "Sözcüklerinden yeşile çalan sarı tonlar sızıyor. Verilen sözün tutulacağını sanmam. Bu tip eğlence biçimlerinin kâr etme sebebi, milyarlarca İmparatorluk vatandaşının hayatları boyunca bir tane bile zeno görmüyor oluşu. Cehalet ve merak, devasa bir talep yaratır. Bana böyle öğretilmişti. Ne kadar da doğruymuş."
languages.original_text: "His words are oozing with greenish-yellow hues... I do not think the promise will be kept. Such entertainment is lucrative precisely because billions of Imperium subjects have never encountered a xenos in their life. Ignorance and curiosity create colossal demand... that's what I was taught. And I can see that the lesson was truthful."

traits.locale_text: "Sözcüklerinden yeşile çalan sarı tonlar yayılıyor. Verilen sözün tutulacağını sanmıyorum. Bu tip eğlence biçimlerinin kâr elde etme sebebi milyarlarca İmparatorluk vatandaşının hayatları boyunca bir tane bile zeno görmüyor oluşu. Cehalet ve merak, devasa bir talep yaratır. Bana böyle öğretildi ve bu dersin doğruluğunu şu an görebiliyorum."
